#include<iostream>
#include<stdio.h>
using namespace std;
int sum(int n)
{
    int sum=0;
    while(n>0)
    {
              sum=sum+n%10;
              n=n/10;
              
    }
    return sum;
}
int main()
{
    int t;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
              int n;
              scanf("%d",&n);
              if(n<=6)
                printf("2\n");
              else if(n<=75)
                printf("3\n");
              else if(n<=480)
              printf("4\n");
              else if(n<=2205)
              printf("5\n");
              else if(n<=8232)
              printf("6\n");
              else if(n<=26544)
              printf("7\n");
              else
              printf("8\n");
    }
     return 0;
}
